name: asagi
normalized: if i can't cut it normally…!
asagi sheathed her sword, and ran along the rooftop.
then, she picked up the sharp, pointed thing that had rolled across the floor, and made a huge leap.
──towards the majuu, which was about to get up.
asagi was coming down over the majuu's head like a bullet.
the horn that asagi had slashed off pierced through the top of the majuu's head.
despite its bristles, which even her sword couldn't go through, the majuu's horn had sunk deep into its own body.
having torn through its skin, the horn had penetrated as far as the majuu's lower jaw.
the majuu collapsed, howling in its death throes, and its whole body was suddenly enveloped in flame.
the flames instantly burned up the beast of hell, and turned it to ash.
